root.name: Battle Isle
root.description: The player would play against the computer or in a two player hotseat mode. The game depicts a military conflict between two factions on the planet of Chromos. The maps are viewed from a top-down perspective and feature the units, terrain, roads, water and buidlings as well as a grid system to visualize the range of movement capabilities. In turns, the factions would move their units. The mission goals vary from map to map and can include the capture or protection of buildings or annihilatin of the enemy or enemy forces. The buildings can have specific functions as well, serving as ammunition depot or bunker etc. In the case of a battle (Some unit had ranged attacks), an in-game window would pop up which graphically depicted the outcome of the battle.
